mireka.filter
Class StatelessFilterType

java.lang.Object
  mireka.filter.StatelessFilterType
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataRecipientFilter, FilterBase, FilterType
Direct Known Subclasses:
AcceptAllRecipient, AcceptDomainPostmaster, AcceptGlobalPostmaster, AcceptPostmaster, ProhibitRelaying, RefuseUnknownRecipient, SavePostmasterMail, StopLoop
public abstract class StatelessFilterType
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilterType, DataRecipientFilter

Note: implementing classes must be thread safe, because they can be used by multiple connections at the same time.

 void dataRecipient(MailData data, Recipient recipient)
          This method and the FilterBase.data(mireka.filter.MailData) method are called together, the similar methods of the next filter will be called only after both methods have been run.
 void done()
          it is always called, even if some other filter failed or no mail was delivered in this mail transaction
 void from(java.lang.String from)
           
 void recipient(Recipient recipient)
          it is only called if one of the filters accepted the recipient in FilterBase.verifyRecipient(mireka.mailaddress.Recipient)
 FilterReply verifyRecipient(Recipient recipient)
          it is not called if a previous filter has already accepted the recipient
